content.rendered:
Underground Credit Card sites

cardingteam.ru is a card store that specializes in selling credit cards only. There is no option to purchase a single card or any other digital product. But the dump database is quite large, regularly updated and comes with extensive search filters. You can find the onion link for on the right side of this article.

As with many card stores, Underground credit card sites you need to register for an account before you can access the market

Once your account is created, you have immediate access to the dump database. No deposit required to access any data. For any deposit, the only currency accepted is bitcoin, so you should make sure to transfer enough that the transaction fees are acceptable.

 

Do not offer mass sales. Also note that refunds are not possible for Citibank, USAA Savings Bank, and Regional Bank. Otherwise, the default refund time is three hours if you buy less than 20 refills

Security Recommendations

As with all darknet sites, the usual security recommendations apply. Most important: anonymity. Use only the TOR browser and do not use the TOR browser for any regular (non-darknet) browsers.

Before accessing the website using the TOR browser, you should disable JavaScript (Preferences -> Privacy & Security -> Security Level -> Switch to “Most Secure”). explicitly designed so that you don’t need JavaScript, this allows you to increase your security by turning it off.

Ideally you have a dedicated system or at least a dedicated virtual machine for all your darknet activities. Underground credit card sites Keep your darknet PGP keys and other credentials confined to that system only, do not mix it with any activity that could expose your identity.

Treat your dedicated system like a working system: Install only the software necessary for your operation, do not install anything for entertainment or other purposes. Then resist the urge to browse Twitter, Reddit, or any other social media site while you have some downtime. For this, always use your usual system.

For additional system security, we recommend running a secure operating system like Tails or Whonix on your dedicated system for darknet activities. We also recommend using a VPN as an added security measure as TOR will only anonymize your browsing sessions and not other traffic.

Especially when using any public WiFi hotspot, you should always use a VPN when accessing the Internet because you don’t know if the hotspot has been compromised.

Summary

Is the card store that you want to visit when you especially want to buy a lot of yards. It has a large number of dumps from different drops and the site is updated regularly, often daily. Since the only deposit option is bitcoin, this site is mainly suitable for larger orders.

Click here to BUY
